title: I Cant Find twisted treeline ranked
body:
So on the client I cant find twisted tree line ranked 3v3 tab and there isn't anything on the forums about it or the subreddit about it being taken out of the game or going down for maintence

Me and a few of my friends wanted to try out for ranked 3's and see where we stand in terms of rank and the button to queue isn't even there.

replies.body: 3v3 Normals are currently available!  Ranked teams are currently on a schedule, and will appear during a specific time frame.  The [ranked team schedule](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) will provide these details, so get your practice in and prepare for when it's enabled!  Good luck!
That article is outdated and does not reflect the time extensions launched in [Patch 6.15.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-615-notes#patch-ranked-team-queues)

Aha, that's right the schedule was recently [updated](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-615-notes#patch-ranked-team-queues)!  


> Full-team ranked play windows have been extended (now Weekdays 4 PM PDT - 12:00 AM PDT / Weekend: 2 PM PDT - 12:00 AM PDT)
> 

Thanks Rineyy!

Just like ranked teams for Summoner's Rift, Twisted Treeline ranked is only available at certain times of the day. On weekdays, it is available from 4 pm to midnight PDT, so it will be available in about 3 hours.
Darn, I had it right, then changed it because I saw the link Porocles posted. Lol, oh well.
